price: 46. Y hablará a los hombres en la cuna y en la madurez, y será de los rectos y virtuosos”.
arabic: وَيُكَلِّمُ ٱلنَّاسَ فِي ٱلۡمَهۡدِ وَكَهۡلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wayukallimu al-nāsa fī al-mahdi wakahlan wamina al-ṣāliḥīna
